page.title: 10N. Bransholme, social.
page.content:
There are{five}schools in the area, 3 primary (5-9) and 2 Junior High (9-13). The senior children (13-16+) must travel to other parts of the city as the long promised Senior School for the area had not yet being built. This school was top be situated North of the Fordyke stream on the West side of Wawne Road.
Access to the city is via one small road to the South. A country lane to the North passes through Wawne and continues up towards Beveley.
There is neither a police or fire station on this part of the estate, however, because of the limited access to the South a small{'emergency'}only road was added in{1985.
